quicktutorial_objDesc_tut: Learn the bare basics of playing Zero-K. Follow the provided instructions at each step.

Let's make a \255\255\255\0\factory\008 to build units. 
Build a \255\0\255\255\Cloaky Bot Factory\008.

+ Select your commander
+ Click the Factory tab in the menu (highlighted)
+ Left click the Cloaky Bot Factory button
+ Left click on the ground where you want to place the building

Let's make some units with our factory. Build five \255\0\255\255\Glaive\008 bots.

+ Select your new factory
+ Left click the \255\255\255\0\Units\008 tab
+ Left click Glaive five times

+ Select your commander
+ Left click the \255\255\255\0\Orders\008 tab in the menu
+ Press \255\0\255\0\W\008
+ \255\0\255\0\Left click and drag\008 a circle on the ground covering the mex spot

We also need a \255\0\255\255\Solar Collector\008 to produce energy.

+ Click the \255\255\255\0\Econ\008 tab in the menu (highlighted)
+ Left click the Solar Collector button

quicktutorial_persistent_camera:

Well done. Now you know the basics of Zero-K.

Click Next to end the tutorial.
